articles.title: Cleanser
articles.purpose: Purpose: to get all of the dirt and bacteria out of your skin. Your skin accumulates a lot of dirt and bacteria every day, so leaving the bacteria on long term will lead to skin issues
articles.importance: Importance: use a cleanser so that the products you use to treat your skin can be effective since your skin is clean
articles.ingredient1: Ingredient 1: Ceramides -- lipids that make up to 50% of the skin composition to form the natural skin barrier
articles.ingredient2: Ingredient 2: Hyaluronic Acid -- essential for maintaining your skin's moisture balance, is responsible for your skin’s plumpness and volume, smoothes out skin texture
articles.ingredient3: Ingredient 3: Niacinamide -- soothes skin and helps to restore your skin barrier, helps aid skin discoloration

articles.title: Serum
articles.purpose: Purpose: Helps with skin issues: breakouts, dry skin, dark spots
articles.importance: Types: Serums can help with dry skin or be treatments like a chemical Exfoliant to help with breakouts and acne
articles.ingredient1: Ingredient 1: AHA -- Glycolic Acid: alpha hydroxy acid reduces excess dead skin cell buildup for an improved texture, leaving skin soft and smooth
articles.ingredient2: Ingredient 2: BHA -- Salicylic Acid: Clears out pores and controls excess oil production while promoting the easy removal of dead skin cells
articles.ingredient3: Ingredient 3: PHA -- Polyhydroxy Acid: gently exfoliates skin while attracting and retaining moisture without irritation
articles.product2: Product 2: Bliss Clear Genuus Liquid Peel

articles.title: Moisturizer
articles.purpose: Purpose: Helps restore your skin's barrier by sealing in the skin’s natural water preventing transepidermal water loss
articles.importance: Importance: Moisturizers will reduce breakouts and aging
articles.ingredient1: Ingredient 1: Ceramides -- lipids that make up to 50% of the skin composition to form the natural skin barrier
articles.ingredient2: Ingredient 2: Hyaluronic Acid -- essential for maintaining your skin's moisture balance, is responsible for your skin’s plumpness and volume, smoothes out skin texture
articles.ingredient3: Ingredient 3: Green Tea Extract -- helps improve your skin's natural moisture, fights acne, unclogs pores, and reduces inflammation and puffiness in face
articles.product2: Product 2: Versed Dew Point Moisturizing Cream

articles.title: Sunscreen
articles.purpose: Purpose: To protect skin from sun damage
articles.importance: Importance: Most important part of skincare routine, since skincare problems will worsen from sun damage
articles.ingredient1: Ingredient 1: Zinc Oxide -- zinc oxide in sunscreen helps to scatter the sun's rays, which prevents potentially damaging ultraviolet radiation from getting to the skin
articles.ingredient2: Ingredient to Avoid: Oxybenzone -- contributes to coral reef bleaching
articles.ingredient3: ingredient to Avoid: Octinoxate -- contributes to coral reef bleaching
articles.product1: Product 1: Sun Bum Mineral Tinted SPF
